name: razor-claw
effect:
Held: Raises the holder's critical hit counter by 1.
Held by Sneasel: Evolves the holder into Weavile when it levels up during the night.
short_effect: Held: Raises the holder's critical hit ratio by one stage. Held by a Sneasel while levelling up at night: Holder evolves into Weavile.
